/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Power lines stretch across the scene, a common sight in many cities. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of Beijing. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
